name: vision\memory\maze
description:
vision\memory\maze - a maze game with visual memory and logic.
The game is an endless set of mazes that increase in size as you progress through them.
The game has 3 difficulties:
Easy - the labyrinth is always visible and you can easily go through it.
Medium - the labyrinth is not visible and you highlight the passed sections.
Hard - like in Medium difficulty, you don't see the labyrinth and highlight the passed sections, but their number is limited and over time you start to forget the path you have traveled.
